job_details.Functieomschrijving:
At Rabobank, you will take responsibility for the entire software lifecycle - from idea to realization and operation.

   You will join Tribe Digital Platform (DP)
   which is the driving force behind excellent customer experiences. DP ensures safe online access for all our digital interactions, and develops the Rabobank app, the Global Sites & Rabo Business Banking, all from one single platform.

   Within the Tribe, there is the Area Rabo Business Banking (RBB) - which ambition is to make Rabo Business Banking the most trusted and complete financial one-stop-shop for enterprising Netherlands. With Rabo Business Banking, we provide personalized insights into the financial administration and let entrepreneurs arrange everything with confidence in a smooth and simple manner.

   You will be joining a team in the area RBB that focuses on "Insights features"
   which provide RBB clients with categorised transactions and actionable insights on income and spendings to run their business, administration and finances better.

   Are you an engineer who goes beyond just coding and creating new functionalities? Do you have a passion for solving problems, taking responsibility, challenging your colleagues, and ensuring the overall quality of the products and services your team delivers? If so, we want to hear from you!, Rabobank has fully fledged DevOps teams. This means that we are responsible for changing and deploying our applications. But that also means that we are responsible for keeping them up and running and stable. You will be asked to have a standby shift on weekdays and over the weekend, this task is rotated between all team members on weekly basis.
job_details.full_text:
Senior backend engineer

At Rabobank, you will take responsibility for the entire software lifecycle - from idea to realization and operation.

   You will join Tribe Digital Platform (DP)
   which is the driving force behind excellent customer experiences. DP ensures safe online access for all our digital interactions, and develops the Rabobank app, the Global Sites & Rabo Business Banking, all from one single platform.

   Within the Tribe, there is the Area Rabo Business Banking (RBB) - which ambition is to make Rabo Business Banking the most trusted and complete financial one-stop-shop for enterprising Netherlands. With Rabo Business Banking, we provide personalized insights into the financial administration and let entrepreneurs arrange everything with confidence in a smooth and simple manner.

   You will be joining a team in the area RBB that focuses on "Insights features"
   which provide RBB clients with categorised transactions and actionable insights on income and spendings to run their business, administration and finances better.

   Are you an engineer who goes beyond just coding and creating new functionalities? Do you have a passion for solving problems, taking responsibility, challenging your colleagues, and ensuring the overall quality of the products and services your team delivers? If so, we want to hear from you!, Rabobank has fully fledged DevOps teams. This means that we are responsible for changing and deploying our applications. But that also means that we are responsible for keeping them up and running and stable. You will be asked to have a standby shift on weekdays and over the weekend, this task is rotated between all team members on weekly basis.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional backend software engineering responsibilities within a financial services context. While it mentions 'insights features' and 'personalized insights', there is no indication of generative AI, machine learning models, or advanced AI techniques. The core tasks revolve around software lifecycle management, DevOps, and building financial applications, which are not specific to AI engineering roles as defined in the coding book. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's a traditional software engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes taking responsibility for the 'entire software lifecycle - from idea to realization and operation', 'coding and creating new functionalities', and developing applications like 'Rabo Business Banking'. This aligns with traditional software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: entire software lifecycle - from idea to realization and operation

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing specific applications and features for business banking clients, indicating a focus on building user-facing software.
job_tasks.phrase: develops the Rabobank app, the Global Sites & Rabo Business Banking

job_tasks.justification: The team focuses on 'Insights features' which implies developing functionalities that provide users with information and analysis.

The role is situated within a specific business area ('Area Rabo Business Banking (RBB)') with a clear ambition to be the 'most trusted and complete financial one-stop-shop for enterprising Netherlands', indicating a need to understand business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: ambition is to make Rabo Business Banking the most trusted and complete financial one-stop-shop for enterprising Netherlands

job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly ML/GenAI modeling, the phrase 'categorised transactions and actionable insights on income and spendings' suggests some form of data processing or analysis to derive insights, which can be loosely related to modeling in a broader sense of data transformation for understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: categorised transactions and actionable insights on income and spendings

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'fully fledged DevOps teams' and responsibility for 'changing and deploying our applications', as well as 'keeping them up and running and stable', including standby shifts. This directly maps to operations and maintenance in a production environment.
job_tasks.phrase: fully fledged DevOps teams. This means that we are responsible for changing and deploying our applications. But that also means that we are responsible for keeping them up and running and stable.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'personalized insights' suggests a level of data analysis or potentially model-driven personalization, though the specific type of modeling is not detailed.

soft_skills.phrase: take responsibility for the entire software lifecycle
ensuring the overall quality of the products and services your team delivers
responsible for changing and deploying our applications
responsible for keeping them up and running and stable
